# colorBlendFactor

**Instance Property**

Controls the blending between the texture and the tile map object’s [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/color]. Values are clamped between zero and one where zero has no color blending and one has the maximum color blending.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var colorBlendFactor: CGFloat { get set }
```

```swift
var colorBlendFactor: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Tinting a Tile Map

- **color**: The base color for the tile map. The influence of the color over the tile map node’s textures is controlled by [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/colorBlendFactor].
